snippet: House Republicans began to consider a path to raise the debt ceiling as Congressional leaders from both parties started some preliminary discussions aimed at reopening the government.
abstract: House Republicans begin to consider a path out of the fiscal impasse that would raise the debt ceiling for a few weeks as they press for a broader deficit reduction deal; approach could possibly set aside the fight over the new health care law, which prompted the shutdown and which some Republicans will be reluctant to abandon.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans began to consider a path to raise the debt ceiling as Congressional leaders from both parties started some preliminary discussions aimed at reopening the government.

headline.main: As Pressure Mounts, House G.O.P. Weighs Short-Term Debt Deal
headline.print_headline: As Pressure Mounts, House G.O.P. Weighs Short-Term Debt Deal

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
